sentence.Network_en: They were impressed by his steadfast good cheer.
sentence.Network_cn: 他整天笑呵呵的样子给他们留下很深的印象。

sentence.Network_en: He remained steadfast in his determination to bring the killers to justice.
sentence.Network_cn: 他要将杀人凶手绳之以法的决心一直没有动摇。

sentence.Network_en: Her steadfast belief never left her for one moment.
sentence.Network_cn: 她坚定的信仰从未动摇过.

...神最基本属性，在旧约圣经出现共二百四十五次，意思是坚定的爱（steadfast love）、忠诚的爱（loyal love）、满有恩慈（full of ki…
消除分歧patched up their differences坚定的朋友steadfast friend将过去的仇恨放在一边put aside the bitterness of the past.

derivation.yuyuan_name: Old English stedefast 'standing firm' (see stead, fast)

entry.tran: 坚定的;坚信的;坚贞不渝的
entry.def: If someone is steadfast in something that they are doing, they are convinced that what they are doing is right and they refuse to change it or to give up.

example.ex: He remained steadfast in his belief that he had done the right thing.
example.tran: 他一直坚信自己做得对。

means.word_mean: 1. marked by firm determination or resolution; not shakable;
2. firm and dependable especially in loyalty;

auth_sentence.content: He has been Leonard Chuene's most steadfast defender.
auth_sentence.res_content: He has been Leonard Chuene's most steadfast defender.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: He has been Leonard Chuene's most steadfast defender.

auth_sentence.content: He found that attractiveness remained steadfast no matter the expression.
auth_sentence.res_content: He found that attractiveness remained steadfast no matter the expression.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: He found that attractiveness remained steadfast no matter the expression.

auth_sentence.content: The trouble is your steadfast refusal to be educated about some things.
auth_sentence.res_content: The trouble is your steadfast refusal to be educated about some things.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The trouble is your steadfast refusal to be educated about some things.

stems_affixes.word_buile: stagn=stan站,立+ant……的→站着不走,停滞的
stand确立+ard→n. 标准, 规格 adj.标准的
stead=stand[v.站, 立, 站起]+fast→稳固的
dis分开+stance=stan站,立→分开站着→有距离→距离
equi平等+distance[n.距离, 远离]→n.等距离
home家+stead=stand[v.站, 立, 站起]→站再家里的→处在家的→家园,家宅
in内+stan站,立+ce→站在里面的东西,表示就在面前→例子
stand确立+ard→n. 标准, 规格 adj.标准的

stand[v.站, 立, 站起]+point点→n.立场, 观点

stan站,立+d→v.站, 立, 站起
